item.title: SoftLayer_Policy_Document_Acceptance_Quote
item.description: SoftLayer_Policy_Document_Acceptance_Quote Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Billing_Oder_Quote data type records acceptance of policy documents for a quote. Local Relational resource Type: SoftLayer_Billing_Order_Quote Count
